name: Material Fusing Chamber
pages: $(o)"Haters will say it's just an alloy furnace."$()$(br2)The $(l)Material Fusing Chamber$() combines up to 3 input materials into 1 output. This machine is absolutely necessary to make the compound materials used in the higher end machinery. It can also automate basic processes like scrap-gold alloying to Netherite ingots.
